mapper.select: SELECT id, goods_name, goods_price, origin_price, goods_images, detail_images, goods_type, comment_amount, collect_amount, deal_amount, add_time, is_sale FROM t_goods g WHERE g.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_goods g SET g.goods_name = #{goodsName}, g.goods_price = #{goodsPrice}, g.origin_price = #{originPrice}, g.goods_images = #{goodsImages}, g.detail_images = #{detailImages}, g.goods_type = #{goodsType}, g.comment_amount = #{commentAmount}, g.collect_amount = #{collectAmount}, g.deal_amount = #{dealAmount}, g.add_time = #{addTime}, g.is_sale = #{isSale} WHERE g.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_goods g WHERE g.id = #{id}
